Sinesis arives at Rampage's base.

Sinister arives at the Maximal base...
 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 11:45 PM
  Subject: Re: The End is=
 Near...........


  Twister/Blizzard

   
   
  *Twister follows Sinesis t=
owards the Predacon Base*


  *Blizzard walks next to Sinister towards the =
Maximal Base*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 8:56 PM
    Subjec=
t: Re: The End is Near...........


    Sinesis walks toward the Predacon b=
ase. Sinister walks toward the Maximal base...
      ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Saturday, August 05, 2000 8:44 PM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...=
........


      Twister/Blizzard


      Twister: We'll never know until w=
e try!

      *Twister says to Sinesis*

      Twister: Which way to his ba=
se?

      *Twister asks Sinesis*




      *Blizzard holds Sinister's hand=
 starts walking towards the Maximal Base*

        ----- Original Message -=
---- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: =
Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:48 PM
        Subject: Re: The End is Near.....=
......


        "Partner's!" Sinesis says. He starts to think.

        "T=
hink Rampage will want us on his side?" Sinesis asks Twister.

        Sini=
ster starts toward the Maximal base while holding Blizzard's hand...
      =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
        =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:38 PM=

          Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


          Blizzard/Twi=
ster


          *Blizzard sighs and keeps walking but looks behind her and=
 than doesn't anymore*



          Twister: Your right. It's not like she =
was going to let me stay anyway.

          *Twister stands up*

          =
Twister: I think we start looking now. The sooner the better. Partners?

  =
        *Twister says to Sinesis while holding her fist out for him to hit =
his on*

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECOD=
E 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, August 0=
5, 2000 5:33 PM
            Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


     =
       Sinister listens carefully to the words of Blizzard.

            "W=
ho needs a home, Twister!? Let's just go find another team that wants us an=
d we shall be on our way to glory!" Sinesis said to Twister...
            =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
      =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, August 05, 20=
00 6:02 AM
              Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


        =
      Blizzard/Twister


              *Blizzard begins walking*

         =
     Blizzard:..Who am I kidding...I don't know what to do, I probably eat =
myself!

              *Blizzard says sadly*

              Blizzard: It se=
ems the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even my sister. I kno=
w the way she was acting, not normal.

              *Blizzard says to Sini=
ster and sighs and continues walking*



              *Twister looks at Si=
nesis*

              Twister: It was up to me tell the others too but I di=
dn't because I didn't do it before I tried to stop Retroflame and I didn't =
after because I was too concerned with saving myself....That was the past a=
nd the future can be different but it isn't looking up now that we have no =
home...

              *Twister says to Sinesis

                ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
   =
             Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


                "Oka=
y." Sinister said lamely. He walked off with Blizzard whenever Blizzard wal=
ks off.

                Sinesis sighs.
                 
                "=
I always said I never made any mistakes. That I was perfect, but once, I wa=
s supposed to fight some criminals that had a bounty on them, but I was not=
 to harm anyone else. I killed that criminal for my own selfish needs, but =
he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could disarm it, but all I did was set =
the time even lower, and some bots didn't have time to get away. I managed =
to get away since I knew about it, but I never told them, so that's why I c=
hose the evil path in life, I felt I had done something evil..." Sinesis sa=
id...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  Fro=
m: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
     Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
                  Subject: Re:=
 The End is Near...........


                  Twister/Blizzard


        =
          Twister: I was sent on a mission to stop another bot named Retrof=
lame. She planed to blow up some other bots that didn't know a thing becaus=
e she claimed that they were in her way. I was given no partners for there =
were none to give. I didn't stop them....I tried but I was shelfish and exc=
aped in a pod thinking of only myself and other bots were killed not only b=
ecause of Retroflame but also because of me....I deserved to be near that b=
omb.....There were missions before that but I wish not speak of for I have =
failed too many.......I wouldn't kill myself for I would probably be sent b=
ack down for the Matrix would not want my selfish kind in.......

         =
         *Twister says to Sinesis*


                  *Blizzard sighs and =
looks up again still frowning*

                  Blizzard: We need to find=
 shelter, my love.

                  *Blizzard says to Sinister*

        =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE=
 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Sat=
urday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
                    Subject: Re: The End is =
Near...........


                    Sinesis walks to Twister.

          =
          "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of one of your adven=
tures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. Sinister shook his he=
ad.

                    "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stronghold and Blen=
der look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's misfortune an=
d take a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all the time ho=
ping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and always will =
be a failure...
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
               From: ilovealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                      Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
    =
                  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


               =
       Twister/Blizzard


                      *Twister looks at what was =
left of the base*

                      Twister: I always be nothing but a=
 failer with nowhere to go...

                      *Twister walks next to=
 the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


                =
      *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

            =
          Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can actually cal=
l home.....

                      *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

  =
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                       =
 From: THECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
             Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
                      =
  Subject: The End is Near...........


                        Dracona loo=
ked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and walked back t=
oward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun around and grab=
bed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

                        "Yo=
u do not know when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot,=
 I'm going to grind you so small you won't be able to be seen with a micros=
cope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. I=
t missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfactio=
n. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again turned to=
 her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plinti=
ssa dodged. Dracona started to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa s=
till avoids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until no=
w, after her bad life that she discovered her true fighting power. Plintiss=
a beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plint=
issa spun a simple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and =
sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hu=
ndred times. Plintissa fell.

                        "Th weak move aside a=
nd die so the strong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has always=
 been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend, but d=
on't take this personally, it's just business." Dracona said.
             =
            
                        Dracona pulled back the saw blade and =
thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and thr=
ew it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as sh=
e did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dra=
cona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived on =
the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces everywhe=
re. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

                        "=
*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." A=
nd Dracona died smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona tha=
t she would never leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran ev=
erywhere and she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plint=
issa. He was crying, too.

                        "Artist, I'm sorry it ha=
d to end this way." Plintissa whispered.

                        "Why are =
you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

   =
                     "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we =
can't part, she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the ex=
tinguished spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

  =
                      "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reas=
on to live, all my friends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said=
.

                        "Your helping days are never over, and we'll alw=
ays be together." Plintissa said.

                        "This isn't some=
 lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

              =
          "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Te=
am Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destro=
yed by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally built i=
t. And there it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis lo=
oks at the base and sighs.

                        "Twister, Dracona is de=
ad, I guess we have to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizza=
rd and sighs.

                        "Blizzard, we need to find another h=
ome, now." Sinister said sadly.

                        Artist came closer=
 to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her and floated into Artist's =
hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He opened his chest compartmen=
t and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plintissa's spark with his ow=
n, they became one.

                        "Till all are one." Artist whi=
spered really low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist was overj=
oyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now they could never be seperated aga=
in. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twis=
ter. ran out into a field.

                        "Artist, now we need to=
 take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can =
hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward the Maximal base, there Dracona wo=
uld get a new body, one she could not attack anyone ever again in, and wher=
e she can always be helpful. Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark =
still inside.

                        "I love you." Artist said seemingly =
to nobody.

                        "I love you too." Plintissa said to Art=
ist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
